Options:

Question: In the movie 'Gods of Egypt' (2016), which of the following statements about the characters Isis and Osiris are true?
Options:
A. Isis is the wife of Osiris.
B. Osiris is the king of Egypt.
C. Isis is the sister of Osiris.
D. Osiris is a god of the underworld.
Answer: Isis is the wife of Osiris., Osiris is the king of Egypt.

Question: In the 2016 movie 'Gods of Egypt', which of the following relationships are accurately depicted regarding the characters Set and Osiris?
Options:
A. Set is the brother of Osiris
B. Osiris is the king of Egypt
C. Set is the king of Egypt

Answer: A. Set is the brother of Osiris, B. Osiris is the king of Egypt

B. Horus is the brother of Set

Answer: Hathor is the lover of Horus, Set is the enemy of Horus

B. Bek is a young thief.

Question: In the movie 'Gods of Egypt' (2016), which of the following statements are true regarding the characters Thoth and Horus?
Options:
A. Thoth is the brother of Horus.
B. Horus is the God of the Underworld.
C. Thoth is associated with wisdom and writing.

Answer: Thoth is the brother of Horus., Horus is the Egyptian God of Air., Thoth is associated with wisdom and writing.

B. Set is the architect of Urshu.
C. Urshu serves as the architect for Set.
D. Set is the Egyptian God of the Desert.
Answer: Urshu is the second-in-command of Set., Urshu serves as the architect for Set., Set is the Egyptian God of the Desert.

B. Isis is the wife of Set.
C. Nephthys is the wife of Set.

Answer: A) Isis and Nephthys are sisters., B) Isis is the wife of Set., C) Nephthys is the wife of Set.

B. Set is the Egyptian God of the Desert.

Options:
A. Anat is a goddess of war.
B. Set is the Egyptian God of the Desert.
C. Anat betrays Set in the film.
D. Anat is loyal to Set.
Answer: Anat is a goddess of war., Set is the Egyptian God of the Desert., Anat is loyal to Set.

Question: In the movie 'Gods of Egypt' (2016), which of the following statements about the characters Bek and Horus are true?

A. Bek is a mortal who becomes an ally of Horus.
B. Horus is the Egyptian God of the Underworld.
C. Bek and Horus team up to fight against Set.
D. Horus is the God of Air who seeks to reclaim his throne.
Answer: A) Bek is a mortal who becomes an ally of Horus., C) Bek and Horus team up to fight against Set., D) Horus is the God of Air who seeks to reclaim his throne.
